pages.text: Upcoming Local Events Your Insider’s Guide to Isle of Palms Unlock more than a room; immerse yourself in the heartbeat of Isle of Palms. Our central location makes it easy to access the island’s most popular events while offering a tranquil retreat when you’re ready to unwind. Halloween Golf Cart Parade & Carnival October 26, 2024 Bring the entire family and enjoy a costume golf cart parade, a drive through haunted house, inflatables, food vendors, trick or treat bags, games and much more! The parade begins just a few blocks away from our front doors. Holiday Street Festival December 7, 2024 Kick off the holiday season with Isle of Palms Holiday Street Festival. Enjoy arts and crafters, food vendors, children activities, live entertainment, and Santa Clause! The festival is steps away from our hotel. Festival of Lights November 15 - December 31, 2024 The Festival of Lights is a favorite Lowcountry tradition during the holidays. Drive through James Island County Parks and enjoy more than 700 shimmering light displays and holiday tunes!
